name: Rock Band Rivals
summary: The Rock Band Rivals expansion brings brand new features to Rock Band 4. Perform your way through an epic rock documentary about your band in a new campaign mode, join Crews to prove your skill and crush your opponents through weekly online challenges, and get a free backstage pass to months of additional game updates, including Synchronous Online Multiplayer with your friends this holiday.

esrb.synopsis: This is a music and rhythm simulation game in which players can perform songs along with on-screen avatars. Players follow along on the guitar, bass, drums, or microphone and are scored based on the accuracy of notes hit. Some song lyrics contain references to drugs/drug use: “There's too much coke and too much smoke”; “Stuck a needle in your arm/So take another toke have a blow for your nose”; “Can't speak a word when you're full of 'ludes.” A handful of songs also reference sexual activity: “Take out the garbage, masturbate”; “I miss the rough sex...".
